topic.title: Conflict between zerobet and bleachbit on Ubuntu  20.04 LTS
topic.body: Today i used bleachbit to clean my seedbox...but the cleaner deleted all optional files from zeronet including all seeded files on galactichan. Please dont use bleachbit on zeronet hardware and stay online to help me to reupload all files in the seedbox

1622996253_1PYse2fs94EphqFApJnUCBPa4wMNT.body:
> [deadsovereignty](#comment_34_1Hkb9FSSux5SJFvuaQ5SKFnievTujtAsZt): okay... involuntary self nuking... how tragic... at least it wasn't a CME...

The seedbox us finishing redownloading the missing files ðŸ˜Š i reporter this here to avoid that another have the same problem

I Will recover almost all! ðŸ˜ The good thing of zeronet and decentralization! ðŸ˜Š

1624485005_125RjAmY5yz8vTXJRzTAgL97GXeK8.body: Totally agree with "Pippofranco" . When this law Will be approved also using a drop or aubergine emoji on a girl Instagram profile potentially could be illegal (misoginy) the same for writing things Like "bella figa" (beautiful girl) or using memes Like "the black of whatsapp" or with trans or ill people...potentially anything that isn t "politically correct" could be illegal.... Here these delirant guys are telling that any compliment Hide a "rapist" or a criminal...maybe we should Ask why...or asking What Will be the next target! Vaccines? (What opinion of many about Them?) Or maybe trolling on internet? Or What else?

1623654807_15brvpgJ5PFKGLF6976wR5gMd2ryz.body: Look at my cc content on galactichan...many of my files are more shared than copyrighted ones...ðŸ˜

1624866212_1Nyun2wrnJmfK1LjX3WSfsM7eAzng.body: To seed a file on a web server Simply install  zeronet in a vps or a dedicated server. I can seed your zite of you want and also add It to my proxy (Only legal content)

1624862334_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: I forked zerohello and created i new bundle...but im not a developer! â˜¹ï¸ Actually zeronet work well and as others long abandoned project Like emule It should workshop also without nofish...but we must upgrade to the new onion protocollo as soon as possibile!

1624835115_129GZPA7VpPa3YaRRW2ani34CaowY.body: Zeronet Will continue to work also without nofish due to ita decentralizzati nature and Is working well without serious issues...anyway we should upgrade to the new onion protocol as soon. As possibile! ðŸ˜Š Im not a developer but i created weeks ago a ne bundle with a ne zerohello indipendent from nofish. Anyone could help me to upgrade the onion protocol?

Link to download my fork from clearnet

https://antonellogalati.com/zeroseed-pack/

You can find It also on galactichan on the zeronet board
